attributes.action: Demand that the UK government allow Nigel Farage to help negotiate Brexit
attributes.additional_details: We must have the right people to negotiate the best deal for Britain. When article 50 is triggered, Nigel Farage MEP, who has inside knowledge of how the EU operates, and who has demonstrated his love and commitment to the UK and its people, MUST be chosen to join the team who will negotiate and plan the safest and smoothest exit from the EU.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage MEP has fought throughout his entire political life to get us a referendum on Britain's EU membership.He has the experience and the knowledge to advise and negotiate the best terms for our exit from the union. We, the people demand that he be allowed to work alongside others to do so.
